headline: Revolution Medicines (RVMD) Dives 16.9% as Merck Withdraws Takeover Plan
summary: We recently published 10 Big Names Stumbling Hard. Revolution Medicines Inc. (NASDAQ:RVMD) was one of the worst performers on Monday. Revolution Medicines fell sharply on Monday, losing 16.91 percent to close at $97.78 apiece, as investors unloaded portfolios following news that pharmaceutical giant Merck had cancelled ongoing negotiations for its proposed acquisition of the company.
